short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension for syncing bookmarks across devices via WebDAV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Features

- 📚 Complete Bookmark Synchronization
  - Support bookmark upload and download
  - Maintain bookmark folder structure
  - Smart handling of bookmarks bar and other categories
- 🔄 WebDAV Integration
  - Support standard WebDAV protocol
  - Provide connection testing functionality
  - Support custom server address
- 🔒 Security
  - Secure storage of WebDAV credentials
  - Use Chrome sync storage to protect sensitive data
  - Simple password encryption storage
- 🔔 Smart Notifications
  - Real-time bookmark change alerts
  - Badge display for unsynchronized status
  - Prevent duplicate notifications during sync operations
- 🎨 User Interface
  - Carefully designed popup window
  - Responsive operation feedback
  - Clean and simple settings management interface

## 功能特性

- 📚 完整的书签同步功能
  - 支持书签的上传与下载
  - 支持书签文件夹结构的保持
  - 智能处理书签栏和其他书签分类
- 🔄 WebDAV 集成
  - 支持标准 WebDAV 协议
  - 提供连接测试功能
  - 支持自定义服务器地址
- 🔒 安全性
  - 安全存储 WebDAV 认证信息
  - 使用 Chrome 同步存储保护敏感数据
  - 密码简单加密存储
- 🔔 智能提醒
  - 书签变更实时提醒
  - 使用徽章显示未同步状态
  - 防止同步操作时的重复提醒
- 🎨 用户界面
  - 精心设计的弹出窗口
  - 响应式操作反馈
  - 简洁的设置管理界面
